data.title: Events In Boston This Weekend
data.meta_description: Enjoy events in Boston this weekend.
data.text:
The FRIENDS Experience: The One In Boston

Recurring weekly on Sunday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday

Step into the world of FRIENDS™ and experience your favorite show like never before at the new FRIENDS™ experience: The One in Boston! Explore set recreations including Joey and Chandler’s apartment and Monica’s kitchen, access exclusive FRIENDS merch, and more! Operating Hours…

Museum of Fine Arts, Boston

Recurring daily

The outlandish and iconoclastic artist Salvador Dalí (1904–1989) is famous for his bizarre imagery and distinctive Surrealist vision. He was, however, also deeply rooted in tradition. Dalí studied, emulated, and indeed revered his European predecessors from centuries past…

Institute of Contemporary Art

Recurring weekly on Sunday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday

Highlighting the rich interplay between imagery and text and the related practices of looking and reading, Wordplay draws primarily from the ICA’s permanent collection to showcase how contemporary artists have played with words to animate and expand their art practices. Text has…

Harvard Museum of Natural History

Recurring daily

Embark on a daring voyage into the depths of human imagination at the Harvard Museum of Natural History’s new exhibition, Sea Monsters: Wonders of Nature and Imagination. Featuring ancient mariners' maps, literature, works of art, and natural history specimens, this exhibit…

Institute of Contemporary Art

Recurring weekly on Sunday, Saturday

Join us for an immersive hands-on art-making experience and create physical artifacts that hold memories, manifestations, and movements of and toward collective care. Boston artist Sabrina Dorsainvil transforms the ICA Bank of America Art Lab into a space for visitors to make art…

Prudential Center's South Garden

Recurring weekly on Saturday

Enjoy free outdoor movies on Prudential Center’s South Garden every Saturday starting on July 13th. Grab a blanket, some treats from our onsite eateries, and enjoy children’s entertainment starting at 6 PM. From classics to recent blockbusters, the movie selection is curated to…

Boston Harbor City Cruises

Recurring daily

Set sail with us for the whale watch experience of a lifetime. Our destination: Stellwagen Bank Marine Sanctuary, a rich feeding ground for whales, dolphins, sea birds and other marine creatures. You’ll have a good chance to view several different species of large whales…

Long Wharf

Recurring daily

Get ready for more thrills, more laughs, and more speed than you ever imagined as you zip across the ocean at up to 40 miles per hour. The wind roars. The music blares. And the waves will splash during a wet and wild 40-minute ride of full blast, sensational fun. Codzilla runs on…

Boston Public Garden

Recurring daily

Embark on a uniquely Boston experience with a Swan Boat ride in the Public Garden. Nestled in the heart of the city, the Swan Boats have been enchanting visitors since their opening in 1877, preserving a glimpse of Boston's rich history while offering a serene escape from the…

Institute of Contemporary Art

Recurring weekly on Sunday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday

In summer 2018, the ICA opened the ICA Watershed in East Boston. Located in the Boston Harbor Shipyard and Marina, the ICA Watershed transformed a 15,000-square-foot, formerly condemned space into a vast and welcoming space to see and experience large-scale art. The 2024 season…

Rose Kennedy Greenway

Recurring weekly on Sunday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday

We look forward to welcoming you at the Greenway Carousel at The Tiffany & Co. Foundation Grove on The Greenway. Take a spin on one of our native New England carousel creatures, located in the heart of downtown Boston. This is the only carousel of its kind. The hand-carved…

Boston Common

Recurring daily

Join us all summer long at the Emerson UnCommon Stage and Harpoon Beer Garden located in the Boston Common on the corner of Tremont and Boylston Streets. The Beer Garden is open 7 days a week from 12PM – 9PM, weather depending. ENTERTAINMENT: Emerson College brings to the…

Park 9 Dog Bar

Recurring weekly on Sunday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday

New England’s first and only indoor dog park and bar, is bringing the popular dog-friendly space outdoors to The Station in Boston’s bustling Fenway neighborhood. In collaboration with Samuels & Associates, the summertime Park-9 at The Station pop-up will provide a clean and…

New England Aquarium

Recurring daily

Dockside, an outdoor beer garden that is open to the public and located in front of the Aquarium, features Cisco and Kona beer alongside barbecue favorites such as ribs, pulled chicken and pork, and burgers, as well as a variety of salads and sides.

Eataly Boston

Recurring daily

Savor the essence of Italy under the summer sky this season at IL Patio Di Eataly! Located on Boylston Plaza, this open-air haven transforms into a charming European-style piazza come summertime, perfect for gathering with friends and family. Indulge in authentic Italian cuisine…

Seaport

Recurring daily

Cisco Brewers Seaport is located just a block down Seaport Boulevard, near The Current and Mejuri. Cisco Brewers is bringing a slice of Nantucket to Boston with its seventh season in Seaport featuring its award-winning craft beer and wine, and more. The outdoor beer garden…

The Anchor Boston

Recurring daily

The Anchor Navy Yard is now open for the 2024 season! The Anchor is Boston’s only award-winning multi-story public gathering space, performing and visual arts venue, open-air wine and beer garden and special event setting. The beer garden offers a curated collection of local and…

Rose Kennedy Greenway

Recurring weekly on Sunday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday

We are delighted to announce that Trillium Garden on The Greenway will open for another season! Trillium’s drink offerings will be paired with some incredible partners from our 2024 Food Truck Program. Trillium Garden on The Greenway is located at the corner of High Street and…

Charles Hotel, Harvard Square

Recurring weekly on Sunday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday

Come to The newest addition to the Charles Hotel, a casual and "come as you are" bar! The special Garden Bar menu will feature favorites from Taqueria El Barrio’s full menu, including Pollo, Birria, Carnitas, and Veggie tacos, all served with their signature homemade ‘Mi Tierra'…
